experiences.title: Board Member
experiences.subtitle: Amikom Badminton Club (UKM)
experiences.companyDescription: ABC (Amikom Badminton Club) is a student activity unit organization focused on badminton.
workDescription: Register new members for Amikom Badminton Club.
Manage Amikom Badminton Club's social media accounts.
Create Instagram feed posts using Canva.
Provide guidance and training to new club members.
Organize internal tournaments for club members.

experiences.title: Amikom Multimedia Community (KOMA)
experiences.subtitle: Member, Short Film Division
experiences.companyDescription: KOMA (Amikom Multimedia Community) is a student activity unit organization focused on multimedia. KOMA has four divisions: Graphic Design, UI/UX Design, Film, and Animation.
workDescription: A division that studies and discusses the process of creating and writing scripts for short films, and divides tasks among team members to produce new works and experiences. Software used includes Adobe Premiere Pro and others.
